name: Mandriano
description: The Mandriano is a large, menacing plant creature known for its strength and dark powers.
memorable: Its ability to drain the life force of grappling targets and raise them as undead makes it particularly dangerous.
goals: To grapple and drain the essence of its enemies, converting them into undead minions.
relations: Commonly associated with other undead creatures or plant-based enemies.
environment: Typically found in dark, forested areas or damp, secluded locations.
strengths: Good combat capabilities with the ability to grapple multiple foes and drain their life force.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to fire damage and has a low Dexterity that hampers agility.
attacks: Can make two swipe attacks that deal significant slashing damage, and can grapple up to three Medium-sized creatures.
most_powerful_ability: Consume the Spark, which allows it to drain necrotic energy from grappling foes, healing itself while reducing the target's hit point maximum.
senses: Possesses darkvision to see in dim light up to 60 feet and has a passive perception of 13.
skills: Proficient in athletics and perception, helping to enhance its grappling and awareness capabilities.
additional_information: Immunity to poison damage and exhaustion
Ability to control up to twelve undead at once
Uses its strength to excel in grappling foes
Can potentially turn defeated foes into undead minions
test_queries: large plant creature that drains life
menacing grappler that creates undead servants
dark plant monster with poison immunity
creature with strong slashing attacks and grappling
mandatory undead summoner in dark forests
